TopicTitle: Recover a stranded capsule on the Mun

Articles.Content:
The challenge:

First, 'strand' yourself a stock capsule with NO chute, on the surface of the Mun (I do this easily by topping over my Munar Lander! it must just be a bare capsule with no attached RCS tanks/thrusters etc)

Now, the tough part: launch a 'rescue mission' that has to somehow pick up said stranded capsule, and lift it all the way back to Kerbin.

You can use any parts or mods you like (MechJeb recomended!), so long as you list them, and include screenshots or a video to show how you did it!

bonus points if you can actually land at KSC with your recovered capsule!

Joe 8)

grinning from already knowing this is actually rather a tough challenge -5 attempts zero success myself so far...

Unfortunately I have to work tomorrow and can\'t stay up for another 6h to do the Kerbin landing, but I did the rest.

Successful pod return by the 3-vehicle system ( lets just say that the armtruck crew hitched a ride on the munbucket okay?)

Used C7parts because launching the armtruck with vanilla would require slight effort.
